articles.author: Juliana Kaplan
articles.title: Americans are begging Canadians to come back - Business Insider
articles.description: Canadians and American border states used to go together like gravy on fried potatoes, but political tensions have halted Canadian tourism to the US.
articles.content:
David Rye has been hearing a lot less French on the mountain bike trails this summer.
Rye is the outdoor center director at the von Trapp Family Lodge and Resort (yes, of 'The Sound of Music' fame).… [+7455 chars]

articles.author: Dalia Faheid
articles.title: Authorities asked for help in the manhunt for Charlie Kirk’s killer. A father’s intuition led to an arrest - CNN
articles.description: Like thousands of Americans captivated by the manhunt for the shooter who killed conservative political activist Charlie Kirk, a Utah father had seen the photos and video footage of the suspect released by authorities.
